channel.title: Solumstone Station Lock
channel.description:
[u][b]The Program:[/b][/u] Got little brothers and sisters you don't want to play around with your computer while you out, busy or otherwise away from the computer? Or maybe your downloading and don't want the download interrupted whilst your elsewhere? Whatever the reason for wanting your files, folders and other stuff untouchable, make sure it's done properly.
Solumstone Station Lock is an easy to use program that is guaranteed to restrict access to users how do not have permission to access your computer. After running the program your prompted to enter an unlocking password so that you may access your console again. After doing so, you machine will be locked and when, and only when, the password, set by you, is entered, the program will unlock and allow you free access once again.
[b][u]Screen shots[/u][/b] [IMG]http://i226.photobucket.com/albums/dd98/Exgenia/ssl1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i226.photobucket.com/albums/dd98/Exgenia/ssl2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i226.photobucket.com/albums/dd98/Exgenia/ssl3.png[/img]
[b][u]Link[/u][/b] No installation required! Just extract it anywhere and run it! http://s1.uppit.com/d/IWQUVZ
[b][u]Credits[/u][/b] 100% to Syrillia. I built this myself. ;)

item.title: Solumstone Station Lock
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Evan_, post:6, topic:162464”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=220943.msg1914165#msg1914165 date=1196826513]
Just out of curiosity, why did it take 26 seconds(in your screenshot) to scan a 5kb file? I never remember avg being that slow.
[/quote]That’s a timer before avg auto-maticly closes you never had avg before?[/quote]

Did you not read the post above yours? By the way, no hyphen between automatically.

[quote=“Syrillia, post:5, topic:162464”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=220943.msg1914165#msg1914165 date=1196826513]
Just out of curiosity, why did it take 26 seconds(in your screenshot) to scan a 5kb file? I never remember avg being that slow.
[/quote]

That’s not how long it takes. It’s how long the window remains open after the scan is complete. The actual scan was about 2 seconds.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Evan2 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:4, topic:162464”]Just out of curiosity, why did it take 26 seconds(in your screenshot) to scan a 5kb file? I never remember avg being that slow.[/quote]That’s a timer before avg auto-maticly closes you never had avg before?

Read full topic

item.title: Solumstone Station Lock
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

kloplop321:

cool, well here’s a question, do you have CTRL+ALT+DEL locked, as well as ALT-TAB, and ALT-F4?

Well it has a rapid refresh rate that brings the program to the front (which doesn’t lag your PC). So anything opened would sit idly in the background until it was unlocked. Same thing would happen if you pressed ALT-TAB. AS for ALT-F4. Nothing. It’s disabled.

The Un-Named:

Just out of curiosity, why did it take 26 seconds(in your screenshot) to scan a 5kb file? I never remember avg being that slow.

That’s not how long it takes. It’s how long the window remains open after the scan is complete. The actual scan was about 2 seconds.

Read full topic
